patient_information: Age: 33 years Sex: male Travel history: backpacking in India for the previous month
chief_complaint: Diarrhea and flatulence for two weeks
history_of_present_illness: Passage of loose stools (four or five episodes per day) for the past 2 weeks, weight loss, anorexia, malaise, abdominal cramping when passing stool. For the past 3 days he has had bloating and distension after intake of milk products with an urge to pass stool.
physical_exam: Abdomen: mild non-specific abdominal tenderness Weight loss: 4kg weight loss
labs_and_diagnostics: Stool for reducing substances: positive Stool examination for enteric parasites: Giardia trophozoites are seen in the fresh specimen. Giardia cysts are detected on formol-ether concentrated specimens
management_and_clinical_course: Treatment: Given tinidazole 2g as a single oral dose Symptoms after treatment: Stool consistency had returned to normal and the frequency had decreased, no nausea, anorexia had decreased
